title: Could you share your thoughts?
subject: Inna from DentalTap
descr2:
My name is Inna and I'm evangelist at DentalTap. As a dentist I understand that you are busy everyday, but could you please share your feedback about our product, what you like and dont like and would you like to continue using it?

Also, I'm the president of International Dental Association with more than 30,000 members (private company) and we are doing networking events, workshops for dentists on regular basis.
So if you also would like to be a part of our network - please let me know!


Best Regards,
Inna
